markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Amorphous Aspect](/Feats.aspx?ID=2537) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ganzi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=339" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 96 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your body is supremely flexible. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on checks to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) or [Squeeze](/Actions.aspx?ID=31), and when you critically fail when Squeezing, you get a failure instead.
name: Amorphous Aspect
